summary: This document appears to be a forwarded email or letter from August 16, 2023, addressed "To whom it may concern." It contains two personal anecdotes: one describing a man making violent threats about cutting throats while watching a movie, and another about lending money to the same man for his partner's birthday. The document references JPMorgan and a City Bank building with an armed guard.

events.title: Violent Threat During Movie
events.description: An unnamed man became agitated while watching a violent movie and told the narrator and another person that if they "played up" like the woman in the movie, he would slice their throats and enjoy watching the blood come out. He repeated similar threats on two other occasions.

events.title: Loan for Partner's Birthday

The loan was to be repaid in ten days. When the narrator went to collect the money at a City Bank building, they encountered an armed guard and a sniffer dog.
